edu.msu.cse.dkvf

Class DKVFServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.msu.cse.dkvf.DKVFBase
      • edu.msu.cse.dkvf.DKVFServer

  • public abstract class DKVFServer
extends DKVFBase
    The base class for the server side of the protocol. Any protocol needs to extends this class for the server side.

    • Method Detail

      • runAll

        public boolean runAll()
        Runs all service including server connector, storage, server and client listeners.
        Returns:
        true if successful
        false if unsuccessful

      • runListeners

        public ServerConnector.NetworkStatus runListeners()
        Runs listeners for servers and clients.
        Returns:
        The result of the operation

      • sendToServerViaChannel

        public ServerConnector.NetworkStatus sendToServerViaChannel(java.lang.String serverId,
                                                            ServerMessage sm)
        Sends a server message to the server with the given ID. It guarantees that all messages are delivered. It also guarantees FIFO delivery. It does not wait to actually send the message. Instead, it immediately returns. However, each channel has a capacity defined by configuration file that if reached, no more message can be added to the channel, and protocol designer must deal with it.
        Parameters:
        serverId - The ID of the destination server.
        sm - The server message to send
        Returns:
        The result of the operation

      • sendToServer

        public ServerConnector.NetworkStatus sendToServer(java.lang.String serverId,
                                                  ServerMessage sm)
        Sends a server message to the server with the given ID. It does not guarantees delivery. It should be used for messages that tolerate loss.
        Parameters:
        serverId - The ID of the destination server.
        cm - The client message to send
        Returns:
        The result of the operation

      • readFromServer

        public ServerMessage readFromServer(java.lang.String serverId)
        Reads from input stream of the server with the given ID.
        Parameters:
        serverId - The ID of the server to read from its input stream.
        Returns:
        The received ServerMessage object.

      • handleClientMessage

        public abstract void handleClientMessage(ClientMessageAgent cma)
        This message will be called for any incoming client message. Any protocol needs to implement this method.
        Parameters:
        cma - The received client message

      • handleServerMessage

        public abstract void handleServerMessage(ServerMessage sm)
        This message will be called for any incoming server message. Any protocol needs to implement this method.
        Parameters:
        sm - The received server message

      • handleControlMessage

        public ControlMetadata.ControlReply handleControlMessage(ControlMetadata.ControlMessage cm)
        This method will be called for any unknown control message. A protocol can override this method to use control channel.
        Parameters:
        cm - The received control message.
        Returns:
        The reply to the control message.
